blocks.name: coseq0
blocks.content: A complex number whose cosine is zero. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm coseq0(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wb(wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0), wcel(co(co(c0, cdiv, cpi), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cz)))
} = {
  3bitr3d(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0), wcel(co(co(c0, cdiv, cpi), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cz), wceq(cfv(csin, co(co(cpi, cdiv, nat2), caddc, c0)), nat0), wcel(co(co(co(cpi, cdiv, nat2), caddc, c0), cdiv, cpi), cz))
  syl(wcel(c0, cc), wb(wceq(cfv(csin, co(co(cpi, cdiv, nat2), caddc, c0)), nat0), wcel(co(co(co(cpi, cdiv, nat2), caddc, c0), cdiv, cpi), cz)), wcel(co(co(cpi, cdiv, nat2), caddc, c0), cc))
  addcld(co(cpi, cdiv, nat2), c0, wcel(c0, cc))
  sineq0(co(co(cpi, cdiv, nat2), caddc, c0))
  eqeq1d(cfv(csin, co(co(cpi, cdiv, nat2), caddc, c0)), nat0, cfv(ccos, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  sinhalfpip(c0)
  eleq1d(co(co(co(cpi, cdiv, nat2), caddc, c0), cdiv, cpi), cz, co(co(c0, cdiv, cpi), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wcel(c0, cc))
  3eqtrd(co(co(co(cpi, cdiv, nat2), caddc, c0), cdiv, cpi), co(co(c0, cdiv, cpi), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), co(co(co(cpi, cdiv, nat2), cdiv, cpi), caddc, co(c0, cdiv, cpi)), co(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(c0, cdiv, cpi)), wcel(c0, cc))
  divdird(co(cpi, cdiv, nat2), c0, cpi, wcel(c0, cc))
  halfcld(cpi, wcel(c0, cc))
  oveq1d(co(co(cpi, cdiv, nat2), cdiv, cpi), caddc, co(c0, cdiv, cpi), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), wcel(c0, cc))
  eqtrd(co(co(cpi, cdiv, nat2), cdiv, cpi), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), co(co(cpi, cdiv, cpi), cdiv, nat2), wcel(c0, cc))
  divdiv32d(cpi, nat2, cpi, wcel(c0, cc))
  2cnd(wcel(c0, cc))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  oveq1d(co(cpi, cdiv, cpi), cdiv, nat2, nat1, wcel(c0, cc))
  dividd(cpi, wcel(c0, cc))
  addcomd(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), co(c0, cdiv, cpi), wcel(c0, cc))
  halfcld(nat1, wcel(c0, cc))
  1cnd(wcel(c0, cc))
  divcld(c0, cpi, wcel(c0, cc))
  id(wcel(c0, cc))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cpi, cc))
  picn()
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wne(cpi, nat0))
  gt0ne0ii(cpi)
  pire()
  pipos()
}

blocks.name: sinmulcos
blocks.content: Multiplication formula for sine and cosine. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm sinmulcos(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1)), co(co(cfv(csin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, cfv(csin, co(c0, cmin, c1))), cdiv, nat2)))
} = {
  eqtr2d(co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1)), co(co(cfv(csin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, cfv(csin, co(c0, cmin, c1))), cdiv, nat2), co(co(nat2, cmul, co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1))), cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(csin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, cfv(csin, co(c0, cmin, c1))), cdiv, nat2, co(nat2, cmul, co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  3eqtr4d(co(cfv(csin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, cfv(csin, co(c0, cmin, c1))), co(nat2, cmul, co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1))), co(co(co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1)), caddc, co(cfv(ccos, c0), cmul, cfv(csin, c1))), caddc, co(co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1)), cmin, co(cfv(ccos, c0), cmul, cfv(csin, c1)))), co(co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1)), caddc, co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  ppncand(co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1)), co(cfv(ccos, c0), cmul, cfv(csin, c1)), co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  mulcld(cfv(ccos, c0), cfv(csin, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  coscld(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  ffvelrnda(c1, cc, csin, cc, wcel(c0, cc))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wf(csin, cc, cc))
  sinf()
  oveq12d(cfv(csin, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, cfv(csin, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1)), caddc, co(cfv(ccos, c0), cmul, cfv(csin, c1))), co(co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1)), cmin, co(cfv(ccos, c0), cmul, cfv(csin, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  sinadd(c0, c1)
  sinsub(c0, c1)
  2timesd(co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  divcan3d(nat2, co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  mulcld(cfv(csin, c0), cfv(ccos, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  sincld(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  ffvelrnda(c1, cc, ccos, cc, wcel(c0, cc))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wf(ccos, cc, cc))
  cosf()
  2cnd(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sinmulcos(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)→((sin ` c0)[×](cos ` c1))=(((sin `(c0[+]c1))[+](sin `(c0[-]c1)))[÷]2))
} = {
  eqtr2d(((sin ` c0)[×](cos ` c1)), (((sin `(c0[+]c1))[+](sin `(c0[-]c1)))[÷]2), ((2[×]((sin ` c0)[×](cos ` c1)))[÷]2), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  oveq1d(((sin `(c0[+]c1))[+](sin `(c0[-]c1))), cdiv, nat2, (2[×]((sin ` c0)[×](cos ` c1))), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  3eqtr4d(((sin `(c0[+]c1))[+](sin `(c0[-]c1))), (2[×]((sin ` c0)[×](cos ` c1))), ((((sin ` c0)[×](cos ` c1))[+]((cos ` c0)[×](sin ` c1)))[+](((sin ` c0)[×](cos ` c1))[-]((cos ` c0)[×](sin ` c1)))), (((sin ` c0)[×](cos ` c1))[+]((sin ` c0)[×](cos ` c1))), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  ppncand(((sin ` c0)[×](cos ` c1)), ((cos ` c0)[×](sin ` c1)), ((sin ` c0)[×](cos ` c1)), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  mulcld((cos ` c0), (sin ` c1), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  coscld(c0, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  ffvelrnda(c1, cc, csin, cc, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  a1i(c0 ∈ ℂ, (sin : ℂ → ℂ))
  sinf()
  oveq12d((sin `(c0[+]c1)), caddc, (sin `(c0[-]c1)), (((sin ` c0)[×](cos ` c1))[+]((cos ` c0)[×](sin ` c1))), (((sin ` c0)[×](cos ` c1))[-]((cos ` c0)[×](sin ` c1))), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  sinadd(c0, c1)
  sinsub(c0, c1)
  2timesd(((sin ` c0)[×](cos ` c1)), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  divcan3d(nat2, ((sin ` c0)[×](cos ` c1)), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  mulcld((sin ` c0), (cos ` c1), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  sincld(c0, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  simpl(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ffvelrnda(c1, cc, ccos, cc, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  a1i(c0 ∈ ℂ, (cos : ℂ → ℂ))
  cosf()
  2cnd((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  a1i((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), 2 ≠ 0)
  2ne0()
}

blocks.name: coskpi2
blocks.content: The cosine of an integer multiple of negative ` _pi ` is either ` 1 ` or negative ` 1 ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm coskpi2(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0)), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0)))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0)))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cz), wb(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0))), wcel(nat2, cz))
  2z()
  divides(hs0, nat2, c0)
  rexlimdv(hs0, cz, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))))))
  3exp(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))))
  eqtrd(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0)), nat1, w3a(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0)))
  3adant1(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), nat1))
  eqtrd(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), nat1, cfv(ccos, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0)))
  fveq2d(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi), co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0)))
  eqtr2d(co(c0, cmul, cpi), co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), cmul, cpi), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0)))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), cmul, cpi)))
  eqcomd(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), cmul, cpi), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  adantl(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), cmul, cpi), co(c0, cmul, cpi)))
  oveq1(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0, cmul, cpi)
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))), nat1))
  cos2kpi(cv(hs0))
  3ad2ant1(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), c0), wceq(nat1, cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))))
  eqcomd(nat1, cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0)), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))
  iftrue(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0)))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cz), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0)), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0)))
  odd2np1(hs0, c0)
  rexlimdv(hs0, cz, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wi(wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))))))
  3exp(wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))))
  eqtrd(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0)), cneg(nat1), w3a(wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0)))
  3adant1(wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), cneg(nat1)))
  3eqtrd(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), cneg(nat1), cfv(ccos, co(cpi, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))), cfv(ccos, cpi), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0)))
  fveq2d(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi), co(cpi, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0)))
  eqtr2d(co(c0, cmul, cpi), co(cpi, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cmul, cpi), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0)))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0), wceq(co(cpi, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cmul, cpi)))
  3eqtrrd(co(cpi, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cmul, cpi), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), cmul, cpi), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, cpi)), co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), caddc, cpi), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  adddird(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1, cpi, wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  mulcld(nat2, cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  1cnd(wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  oveq12d(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), cmul, cpi), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, cpi), co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cpi, wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  eqtrd(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), cmul, cpi), co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), cmul, cpi), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  oveq1d(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), cmul, cpi, co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  mulcomd(nat2, cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  mulassd(cv(hs0), nat2, cpi, wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  2cnd(wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(nat1, cmul, cpi), cpi))
  mulid2i(cpi)
  addcomd(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cpi, wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  mulcld(cv(hs0), co(nat2, cmul, cpi), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  zcn(cv(hs0))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cc))
  mulcli(nat2, cpi)
  2cn()
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cpi, cc))
  adantl(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0), wceq(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cmul, cpi), co(c0, cmul, cpi)))
  oveq1(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0, cmul, cpi)
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(cpi, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))), cfv(ccos, cpi)))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(cpi, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))), cfv(ccos, cpi)), wcel(cpi, cc))
  picn()
  cosper(cpi, cv(hs0))
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0)), wceq(cfv(ccos, cpi), cneg(nat1)))
  cospi()
  3ad2ant1(wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), c0), wceq(cneg(nat1), cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))))
  eqcomd(cneg(nat1), cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0)), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0)))
  iffalse(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(nat2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmul, cpi)), cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))))
}

blocks.name: cosnegpi
blocks.content: The cosine of negative ` _pi ` is negative ` 1 ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm cosnegpi() {
  |- wceq(cfv(ccos, cneg(cpi)), cneg(nat1))
} = {
  3eqtri(cfv(ccos, cneg(cpi)), cneg(nat1), cfv(ccos, co(cpi, caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))), cfv(ccos, cpi))
  fveq2i(ccos, cneg(cpi), co(cpi, caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))))
